locales.plugin_description: Processes planet donations to and payments from the server.
locales.message_thanks_all: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}$z$s{#donate} received a donation of {#highlite}{2}{#donate} planets from {#highlite}{3}$z$s{#donate}. Thank You!
locales.message_thanks_you: {#server}» {#donate}You made a donation of {#highlite}{1}{#donate} planets. Thank You!
locales.message_donate_help: {#server}» {#error}Use {#highlite}$i /donate <number>{#error} to donate planets to the server
locales.message_pay_confirm: {#server}» {#donate}Payment of {#highlite}{1}{#donate} planets to {#highlite}{2}{#donate} confirmed! Remaining planets: {#highlite}{3}
locales.message_pay_help: {#server}» {#error}Use {#highlite}$i /admin pay <login> $m<number>{#error} to send server planets to a login
locales.message_confirmation: Would you like to pay now?
